document_name: Justice and Human Rights in Afghanistan

Outcome 2 Evaluation: The democratic state and government institutions strengthened at national and sub-national levels to govern and ensure the delivery of quality public services including security with special attention to marginalized groups

donor_name: DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS AND INTERNATIONAL TRADE (DFAIT) GOVERMENT OF CANADA
SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr:
1: Legal awareness capacity improved; Public Legal Awareness Strategy Developed.  Supreme Court Translation Unit and Language Lab established. Administrative capacity of Supreme court enhanced. Organizational assessment of the three justice institutions conducted.
2: Human Rights Support Unit Established in Ministry of Justice ( Staff recruitment, office and logistics in place); Human Rights Support Unit Action Plan in place; Presidential Decree on HR issued.
Output 3: 21 justice facilities rehabilitated/constructed in 3 provinces ( Jawzjan, Badakhshan and Faryab); the same 21 facilities equipped with the necessary furniture and equipments, awareness activities and trainings provided to justice officials and community stakeholders in 3 provinces.
outputs.output_title: Justice and Human Rights in Af

project_descr: Justice and Human Rights in Afghanistan - advocating justice and human rights in Afghanistan through communities, CDCs etc.
project_title: Justice and Human Rights in Afghanistan
